text:
In case this gets lost in the helpdesk traffic, I’ll ask here as well:

I’m trying to use the new “Run Pluto in the Cloud” feature on JuliaHub but it’s been stuck “Spinning up nodes for you” for an hour now.

elements.text: In case this gets lost in the helpdesk traffic, I’ll ask here as well:
I’m trying to use the new “Run Pluto in the Cloud” feature on JuliaHub but it’s been stuck “Spinning up nodes for you” for an hour now.

text: Have you run jobs on JuliaHub before? or is this the first time you have run something there? (just trying to figure out if your account is in a bad state somehow)

elements.text: Have you run jobs on JuliaHub before? or is this the first time you have run something there? (just trying to figure out if your account is in a bad state somehow)

text: Hmnn .. I'll ask a colleague to take a look. Can you DM me the email ID you used and the job id if you can see that.

elements.text: Hmnn .. I'll ask a colleague to take a look. Can you DM me the email ID you used and the job id if you can see that.
